summary: Handling compilation engagements; corporate, trust, and personal tax returns; T4/T5 preparation; investment account reconciliations; ITC reviews; and CRA audit assistance.

Prepared working paper files in CaseWare, reconciled investment accounts, performed foreign currency translations, and supported personal, corporate, and trust tax compliance including T4/T5, foreign reporting (T1134, T1135, T106), and elections in TaxPrep.
Supported tax experts in preparing returns and client communications. Managed admin tasks, document compilation, and customer service. Helped troubleshoot and resolve complex tax queries.
Supported the H1B process during tax season. Supervised team members and assembled 2,000+ electronic files. Reviewed legal documents and formatted reports with MS Office and Adobe.
Prepared student and low‑income individual returns and educated clients on basic tax matters.
